name: Order 99 (Demo)
description:
Welcome to Order 99 A bad batch Dating Simulator. 

This game is set directly after the end of The bad batch Season 1 the only difference being the boys managed to convince Crosshair to come back with them. Join the five clones and Omega of Clone force 99 on a mission to help remove Crosshair's inhibitor chip. 

But be careful...hanging around with five handsome clones, with Omega as your ultimate wingman..there is bound to be some feelings brewing~

This is only a Demo

While donations aren't required they're very much appritiated in order to help me keep developing the game. Everyone who Donates will have their name added to the credits of the full game to show thanks for your support. 

Warning, Full game will be 18+
